description:
Donald Trump provided a big, beautiful description of the Battle of Gettysburg recently, reminding us of Robert E. Lee's famous words: "Never fight uphill, me boys, never fight uphill." We asked Trump to narrate 7 more famous historic battles, and the result was tremendous and magnificent. Everyone says so.

The real battle is getting a good night's rest. The best thing you can use to combat sleep deprivation is MyPillow. Save today using discount code BEE1: https://mypillow.com/bee1

#comedy #history #battle #trump
title: Trump Perfectly Describes 7 Historic Battles

description:
A man died after a Boeing plane fell 6,000 feet in-flight, the Pope told 60 Minutes, “we are all fundamentally good,” and, worst of all, scientists discovered that microplastics are in human testicles. This episode also features the debut of the Red Lobster Facts Segment, while hate mail shows that our detractors can’t decide if The Bee is Jewish or literally Hitler.

This episode is brought to you by My Patriot Supply: http://preparewithbee.com
title: Podcast: Perilous Planes, Plastics, And The Pope
